verses.name: Numbers 30:14
verses.text: But if her husband altogether hold his peace at her from day to day; then he establisheth all her vows, or all her bonds, which are upon her: he confirmeth them, because he held his peace at her in the day that he heard them.

verses.name: Numbers 30:15
verses.text: But if he shall any ways make them void after that he hath heard them; then he shall bear her iniquity.

verses.name: Numbers 30:16
verses.text: These are the statutes, which the Lord commanded Moses, between a man and his wife, between the father and his daughter, being yet in her youth in her father’s house.
